articles.author: Sachin Rawat
articles.title: How An Animal Rescue Tool Helped Control Rabies In An Indian City - Asian Scientist Magazine
articles.description: The monitoring tool might still be underestimating the disease's true prevalence.
articles.content: Asian Scientist Magazine (Nov. 01, 2023) One in every three rabies deaths in the world occur in India, with a majority of them attributed to dog bites. Indias rabies problem is exacerbated by unvacci… [+4261 chars]
